description:
EIM GUI: Cross-Platform ESP-IDF Installation Manager


What's Changed
- release commit v0.7.1 by @Hahihula in #372
- The createrepo-c package on Ubuntu provides the binary as createrepo_c by @Hahihula in #374
- EIM-454 github issues cleanup pipeline added by @Hahihula in #375
- unblock feature select in headles mode agains private repositories by @Hahihula in #380
- EIM-462 update ui fixed windows only gray empty space by @Hahihula in #388
- EIM-416 fix non interactive branch of tools.json file validation by @Hahihula in #340
- [EIM-450] [Test] Add tests for tools selection ui by @Fabricio-ESP in #373
- EIM-468 moved system info to library and unify the approach by @Hahihula in #390
- Eim 467 fix platform override application by @Hahihula in #391
- EIM-333: added log padding in installation progress log container by @alirana01 in #394
- fix: Prevent mirror override when config file is loaded (Windows GUI) by @alirana01 in #387
- temporary dirty fix/workaround which ensures ninja is always installed by @Hahihula in #396
- EIM-216: Elevated permission shell warning (GUI and CLI) by @alirana01 in #368
- EIM-334: prerequisities check enhancement by @alirana01 in #342
- EIM-190 added cleanup command by @Hahihula in #381
- EIM-456 run command in context by @Hahihula in #376
- EIM-89: eim select added for the activation script by @alirana01 in #402
- EIM-443 handle space in python path by @Hahihula in #370
- fix homebrew workflow by @Hahihula in #419
- release commit v0.8.0 by @alirana01 in #423
Full Changelog: v0.7.1...v0.8.0
